name: Nayma,my happiness
greetingText: I cant express in words how much I love you!
wishText: Wishing you endless happiness and success today and always! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy Birthday! Another year, another chance to chase your dreams and make them come true and loving me more and more.
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
text5Content: You are not only special but so the most important person in my life
wishHeading: Happy Birthday and I love you bbe!
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it. We will meet soon In Sha Allah!
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
